pkgmetadata.longdescription: Trio Data Analysis with Knockoff Statistics for FDR Control // Identification of putative causal variants in genome-wide association studies with the trio design. The package implements the methods in the paper: Yang, Y., Wang, C., Liu, L., Buxbaum, J., He, Z., Ionita-Laza, I. (2022). KnockoffTrio: A knockoff framework for the identification of putative causal variants in genome-wide association studies with trio design. The American Journal of Human Genetics, 109(10), 1761-1776.
